item.title: Draft 1200W system: Shortest Possible Payback Period
item.description: Based off the learnings from this midsize 1800W system, I’d like to propose an (as yet unbuilt) midsize system that is customized for short payback period to the best of my knowledge.

item.title: 1800W Apartment Solar + Battery Microgrid that can power a fridge
item.description: As promised, some shots of my solar (self-made) installation. Running 4 - 5 years straight powering full home office and TV, vacuum cleaning. 2 x 180W solar panels = 360W system (0.

item.title: Simplified 100W Micro Solar + Li-Ion Storage kit
item.description: The original article combining DIY deep cycle-lead acid batteries with solar to bring your room off-grid was a huge hit. Now, after 8 months living full-time with the system in my room in San Francisco – the battery finally died.

item.title: 100W DIY Solar + Storage For Hurricane Backup How-To
item.description: A solar system bought and assembled off Amazon can be low-cost backup kept in the basement the rest of the year and then brought out and put together after the hurricane passes through.

item.title: What household devices will 100W DIY Solar run
item.description: A lot of questions we receive here are as to what you can charge and how far the energy will reach. I thought this would be worth a separate, more in-depth analysis.

item.title: 100W Burning Man Solar How-To
item.description: Burning Man is a crazy desert art festival and party in northern Nevada. It takes place on federal public lands and attracts about 60,000 people each year.

item.title: $200 Solar Self-Sufficiency – without your landlord noticing
item.description: Building a solar micro-grid in my bedroom with parts from Amazon The problem Apartment renters need the landlord’s permission to install anything on their rooftops.
